Verses: 1 karththaraal Eremiyaavukku Undaana Vasanam:

2 nee Karththarudaiya Aalayaththin Vaasalile Nindru, Ange Koori Sollavendiya Vasanam Ennavendraal, Karththaraip Panindhukolla Indha Vaasalgalukkulle Pravesikkira Yoodha Janangalaagiya Neengalellaarum Karththarudaiya Vaarththaiyaik Kelungal.
3 isravelin Dhevanaagiya Senaigalin Karththar Sollugiraar: Ungal Vazhigalaiyum Ungal Kiriyaigalaiyum Seerppaduththungal, Appozhudhu Ungalai Indha Sthalaththile Kudiyirukkappannuven.
4 karththarin Aalayam, Karththarin Aalayam, Karththarin Aalayam Idhuve Endru Solli, Poivaarththaigalai Nambikkollaadhirungal.
5 neengal Ungal Vazhigalaiyum Ungal Kiriyaigalaiyum Nandraai Seerppaduththi, Neengal Manushanukkum Manushanukkumulla Vazhakkai Nyaayamaaith Theerththu,

6 paradhesiyaiyum Thikkatravanaiyum Vidhavaiyaiyum Odukkaamalum, Kutramillaadha Raththaththai Indha Sthalaththile Sindhaamalum; Ungalukkuk Kedundaaga Anniya Dhevargalaip Pinpatraamalumiruppeergaleyaagil,
7 appozhudhu Naan Ungal Pidhaakkalukkuk Koduththa Dhesamaagiya Indha Sthalaththile Ungalai Sadhaakaalamum Kudiyirukkappannuven.
8 idho, Ondrukkum Udhavaadha Poivaarththaigalai Neengal Nambugireergal.
9 neengal Thirudi, Kolaiseydhu, Vibasaarampanni, Poiyaanaiyittu, Paagaalukkuth Thoobankaatti, Neengal Ariyaadha Anniya Dhevargalaip Pinpatri,
10 pirpaadu Vandhu, En Naamam Tharikkappatta Indha Aalayaththile Enakku Munbaaga Nindru: Indha Aruvaruppugalaiyellaam Seyvadharkaaga Vidudhalai Petrirukkiromendru Solveergalo?
11 en Naamam Tharikkappatta Indha Aalayam Ungal Paarvaikkuk Kallarkugaiyaayitro? Idho, Naanum Idhaik Kanden Endru Karththar Sollugiraar.
12 naan Mundhi En Naamam Vilangappannina Seelovilulla En Sthalaththukku Neengal Poi, Isravel Janaththinudaiya Pollaappinimiththam Naan Adharku Seydhadhaip Paarungal.
13 neengal Indhak Kiriyaigalaiyellaam Seydheergal, Naan Ungalukku Erkanave Sollivandhirundhum, Neengal Kelaamalum, Naan Ungalaik Kooppittum, Neengal Uththaravukodaamalum Ponapadiyinaal,
14 en Naamam Tharikkappattadhum, Neengal Nambikkai Kondirukkiradhumaana Indha Aalayaththukkum Ungalukkum Ungal Pidhaakkalukkum Naan Koduththa Sthalaththukkum, Naan Seelovukku Seydhadhupola Seyven.
15 naan Ungaludaiya Ellaa Sagodhararumaagiya Eppiraayeem Sandhadhi Anaiththaiyum Thallippottadhupola, Ungalaiyum En Mugaththaivittuth Thallippoduven Endru Karththar Sollugiraar.
16 nee Indha Janaththukkaaga Vinnappam Seyyavendaam; Avargalukkaaga Mandraadavum Kenjavum Vendaam, Ennidaththil Avargalukkaagap Parindhupesavum Vendaam, Naan Unakku Sevikoduppadhillai.
17 yoodhaavin Pattanangalilum Erusalemin Veedhigalilum Avargal Seygiradhai Nee Kaanavillaiyaa?

18 enakku Manamadivundaaga Anniyadhevargalukkup Paanapaligalai Vaarkkiraargal; Avargal Vaanaraakkinikkup Paniyaarangalai Sudumpadi Pillaigal Viraguporukkugiraargal, Pidhaakkal Neruppumoottugiraargal, Sthreegal Maappisaigiraargal.
19 avargal Enakkaa Manamadivundaakkugiraargal? Thangal Mugangal Vetkaththukkutpadumpadi Avargal Thangalukke Allavo Manamadivundaakkugiraargal Endru Karththar Sollugiraar.

20 aadhalaal Idho, En Kobamum En Ukkiramum Indha Sthalaththinmelum, Manusharmelum, Mirugangalmelum, Veliyin Marangalmelum, Boomiyin Kanigalmelum Ootrappadum; Adhu Aviyaamal Eriyum Endru Karththaraagiya Aandavar Sollugiraar.
21 isravelin Dhevanaagiya Senaigalin Karththar Sollugiradhennavendraal Ungal Thaganapaligalai Matrap Paligalodunkootti, Iraichchiyai Saappidungal.
22 naan Ungal Pidhaakkalai Egipthudhesaththilirundhu Azhaiththuvandha Naalile, Thaganapaliyaikkuriththum, Matrap Paligalaikkuriththum Naan Avargalode Pesinadhaiyum Kattalaiyittadhaiyumpaarkkilum,

23 en Vaakkukku Sevikodungal, Appozhudhu Naan Ungal Dhevanaayiruppen, Neengal En Janamaayiruppeergal; Naan Ungalukkuk Karpikkum Ellaa Vazhiyilum, Neengal Ungalukku Nanmai Undaagumpadikku Nadavungal Engira Viseshaththaiye Avargalukku Sollik Kattalaiyitten.
24 avargalo Adhaik Kelaamalum, Thangal Seviyai Saayaamalumpoi, Thangal Pollaadha Irudhayaththin Yosanaigalinpadiyum Kadinaththinpadiyum Nadandhu, Munnittalla Pinnitte Ponaargal.
25 ungal Pidhaakkal Egipthudhesaththilirundhu Purappatta Naalmudhal Innaalmattum Naan Theerkkadharisigalaagiya En Oozhiyakkaararaiyellaam Dhinandhinam Ungalandaikku Erkanave Anuppikkondirundhen.
26 aanaalum Avargal En Sollaik Kelaamalum, Thangal Seviyai Saayaamalum Poi, Thangal Kazhuththaik Kadinappaduththi, Thangal Pidhaakkalaippaarkkilum Adhiga Pollaappu Seydhaargal.
27 nee Indha Vaarththaigalaiyellaam Avargalukku Sonnaalum, Avargal Unakku Sevikodukkamaattaargal; Nee Avargalai Nokkik Kooppittaalum, Avargal Unakku Maruuththaravu Kodukkamaattaargal.

28 aagaiyaal Thangal Dhevanaagiya Karththarudaiya Saththaththaik Kelaamalum, Buththiyai Etrukkollamalum Irukkira, Jaadhi Idhudhaan Endrum, Saththiyam Azhindhu, Adhu Avargal Vaayilirundhu Atrupponadhendrum Avargalukku Sol.
29 nee Un Thalaimayirai Siraiththu, Erindhuvittu, Uyarthalangalile Pulambikkondiru; Karththar Thamadhu Sinaththukku Edhuvaana Sandhadhiyai Veruththu Negizhavittaar.

30 yoodhaa Puththirar En Paarvaikkup Pollaappaanadhai Seydhaargal Endru Karththar Sollugiraar; En Naamam Thariththirukkira Aalayaththaith Theettuppaduththith Thangal Aruvaruppugalai Adhile Vaiththaargal.

31 thangal Kumaararaiyum Thangal Kumaaraththigalaiyum Akkiniyile Thaganikkiradharkaaga, Avargal Innom Kumaaranin Pallaththaakkilulla Thoppeththin Medaigalaik Kattinaargal; Adhai Naan Kattalaiyidavumillai, Adhu En Manadhil Thondravumillai.

32 aadhalaal, Idho, Naatkal Varumendru Karththar Sollugiraar; Appozhudhu Adhu Appuram Thoppedh Endrum, Innom Kumaaranin Pallaththaakkendrum Sollappadaamal, Sangaarappallaththaakkendru Sollappadum; Thoppeththile Idankidaiyaamarpogumattum Savangalai Adakkampannuvaargal.
33 indha Janaththin Pinangal Aagaayaththin Paravaigalukkum Boomiyin Mirugangalukkum Iraiyaagum; Avaigalai Veruttuvaarum Illaadhiruppaargal.

34 naan Yoodhaavin Pattanangalilum Erusalemin Veedhigalilum Kalippin Saththaththaiyum, Magizhchchiyin Saththaththaiyum, Manavaalanin Saththaththaiyum, Manavaattiyin Saththaththaiyum Oyappannuven; Dhesam Paazhaagum.
